issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.168

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ocam.live/index.php?route=product/product&product_id=6307

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
this urle [index.php?route=product/product&product_id=$document,domain=cyou|life|live|shop|xyz] just match people use OpenCart system and  domain name end with cyou|life|live|shop|xyz.  I don't think it's a good rule. it kills so many web site. 

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>
![messageImage_1696557524042](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6611523/adb158db-e868-41d3-9943-a8b1b8ae9f4f)

### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/56843592/does-anyone-have-references-on-how-to-port-aspectj-based-maven-module-to-bazel](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstackoverflow.com%2Fquestions%2F56843592%2Fdoes-anyone-have-references-on-how-to-port-aspectj-based-maven-module-to-bazel) ### Comment Username: @kriegaex > The "Share" links on Stack Overflow are not longer working, both on questions and on answers. The filter mistakes them for social media share widgets, which they are not. The links only display a pop-up with a URL to copy. > > This happened before on Stack Overflow with AdGuard. It was fixed quickly last time, but maybe it makes sense to explicitly white-list that website for this filter type or be more precise in matching. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Не повторяется. Попробуйте оставить только эти фильтры, обновить их (подождите около одной минуты), затем очистите данные браузера, откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Mobile Ads
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Annoyances
AdGuard Russian
```

comment.body:
Странно, но у себя этого не вижу, только если отключить защиту совсем. Иными словами, этот редирект блокируется.

> проверил работы программы по вашей ссылке, везде зелёный значки и надпись - работает. кроме впн, его и уменя и нету

Значит должно работать нормально. На самом сайте какой сертификат используется браузером когда повторяется проблема? Посмотреть можно кликнув на замок в адресной строке - Безопасное подключение - Действительный сертификат.
Попробуйте сделать следующее:
1. Перевести режим драйвера с `TDI` на `WFP`
2. Отключить Dr.Web
3. Обновить фильтры
4. Очистить данные браузера
5. Перезапустить его
6. Открыть сайт.

I was having trouble making payment for a government related service because fetching a Javascript from the domain came with an error. On browser webpage inspection, the GET function threw a ERR_ADDRESS_INVALID error, and I double checked the main site domain with all my browsers it also came with the same error. labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.168

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ocam.live/index.php?route=product/product&product_id=6307

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
this urle [index.php?route=product/product&product_id=$document,domain=cyou|life|live|shop|xyz] just match people use OpenCart system and  domain name end with cyou|life|live|shop|xyz.  I don't think it's a good rule. it kills so many web site. 

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>
![messageImage_1696557524042](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6611523/adb158db-e868-41d3-9943-a8b1b8ae9f4f)
</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>




### Privacy

@Alex-302 Hi, I can reproduce that.

I think they are using SSAI. I need help with dealing this stuff. I couldn't figure out a fix for this but it's not probably unfixable.

That's interesting that they actually detect and block VPN connections...

They claim in their instructions that they have content that is available outside of Finland. They even have a page that is supposed to list them `https://www.mtv.fi/ohjelmat/katsottavissa-ulkomailla` but it's broken. I send them a question why that page is broken.

I'll get back to this when I get a response. At the moment, I can't do more to this case.

comment.body:
@peace2000 try the following rules:
```
@@||fi-mtv3.videoplaza.tv/proxy/distributor$domain=mtv.fi
&browser=MozillaFirefox$xmlhttprequest,removeparam=browser,domain=mtv.fi
mtv.fi##+js(xml-prune, MediaFile, , fi-mtv3.videoplaza.tv/proxy/distributor)
mtv.fi##+js(json-prune-fetch-response, bumpers, , propsToMatch, url:/playback2.a2d.tv\/play/)
```

It seems to be the same owner as tv4play here in Sweden.

### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
I've checked the site in Chrome, Ecosia using a German IP - works fine.

> In Ecosia wird keine einzige Werbung blockiert

Perhaps a certificate or HTTPS filtration does not work. In this case, do the following in the [article](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-android/solving-problems/manual-certificate/).
After that leave only AdGuard filters from the config above, update them, clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
